about_the_game:
STORY

As a software developer, you've created a software that provides correct answers to all questions. Now, you want to test this invention by solving the city's biggest mystery. But seeking the absolute truth in the enigmatic realm of zeros and ones comes with a price. Your choices may steer you toward either inner peace or inner chaos.



GAME FEATURES

Character Development:

Develop your character's physical and mental abilities throughout the story to help them overcome real and fantastical challenges.

Dialogue Choices:

Shape the story and your character through interactive dialogue options. Enjoy an engaging and intriguing storyline.

Journey into Memories:

Explore your character's past and uncover memories by delving into gray and dark areas. Benefit from remembering buried events.

Software Interface:

Solve the country's greatest mystery using powerful computer software. Uncover truths while navigating corporate intrigues and everyday challenges.

Action-Runner Mechanics:

Face demons and monsters in your nightmares, experiencing fast-paced action scenes and feeling the power of the katana.

name: Anomalistic Revolution

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: You're staring into a pit at the heart of the city when your gaze shifts to another void you fear. Use a dark invention to uncover the pit's mystery. Journey through memories, upgrade your skills, and fight nightmare monsters. Your choices will shape the universe’s fate in this multi-ending RPG.
supported_languages: English, Turkish, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian
